name: Project Sci-Fi
description:
Scholar project for 3D Real-Time Assignment at ISART Digital.

Entirely modelled in Autodesk Maya, Textured (texture atlas) in photoshop, assembled & lit in Unity 3D HDRP, scripted in Visual Studio 2019 & door sfx made with sodastream-like hardware. "annoying background" sound effect made in Ableton Live 9.
